    Information Sessions and Promotional Video for EMNLP 2022

    As part of promoting EMNLP 2022 in Abu Dhabi, the local organizing committee chair, Nizar Habash, held information sessions in three major conferences this year: ACL 2022, LREC 2022, and NAACL 2022. Here are the slides from the latest information session in NAACL 2022.

    The information sessions and closing sessions at these conferences also featured a promotional video for EMNLP 2022 in Abu Dhabi (Thanks to the Abu Dhabi Convention and Exhibition Bureau).

    URL: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3tjSurqRZEs  

    For more information about visiting Abu Dhabi, see https://visitabudhabi.ae/en.
